Sharpen.desc: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.
Sharpen.name: Sharpen

Shell Smash.desc: The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.
Shell Smash.name: Shell Smash

Shift Gear.desc: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and sharply raising its Speed stat.
Shift Gear.name: Shift Gear

Shore Up.desc: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.
Shore Up.name: Shore Up

Simple Beam.desc: The user's mysterious psychic wave changes the target's Ability to Simple.
Simple Beam.name: Simple Beam

Sing.desc: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.
Sing.name: Sing

Sketch.desc: It enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the target. Once used, Sketch disappears.
Sketch.name: Sketch

Skill Swap.desc: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.
Skill Swap.name: Skill Swap

Slack Off.desc: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its max HP.
Slack Off.name: Slack Off

Sleep Powder.desc: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.
Sleep Powder.name: Sleep Powder

Sleep Talk.desc: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.
Sleep Talk.name: Sleep Talk

Smokescreen.desc: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target's accuracy.
Smokescreen.name: Smokescreen

Snatch.desc: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.
Snatch.name: Snatch

Soak.desc: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water.
Soak.name: Soak

Soft-Boiled.desc: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.
Soft-Boiled.name: Soft-Boiled

Speed Swap.desc: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.
Speed Swap.name: Speed Swap

Spider Web.desc: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.
Spider Web.name: Spider Web

Spikes.desc: The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing team's feet. The trap hurts Pokémon that switch into battle.
Spikes.name: Spikes

Spiky Shield.desc: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker that makes direct contact.
Spiky Shield.name: Spiky Shield

Spite.desc: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.
Spite.name: Spite

Splash.desc: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...
Splash.name: Splash

Spore.desc: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.
Spore.name: Spore

Spotlight.desc: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.
Spotlight.name: Spotlight

Stealth Rock.desc: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.
Stealth Rock.name: Stealth Rock

Sticky Web.desc: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stats upon switching into battle.
Sticky Web.name: Sticky Web

Stockpile.desc: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def stats. The move can be used three times.
Stockpile.name: Stockpile

Strength Sap.desc: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target's Attack stat. It also lowers the target's Attack stat.
Strength Sap.name: Strength Sap

String Shot.desc: Opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.
String Shot.name: String Shot

Stuff Cheeks.desc: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply raises its Defense stat.
Stuff Cheeks.name: Stuff Cheeks

Stun Spore.desc: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.
Stun Spore.name: Stun Spore

Substitute.desc: The user creates a substitute for itself using some of its HP. The substitute serves as the user's decoy.
Substitute.name: Substitute

Sunny Day.desc: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of Water-type moves.
Sunny Day.name: Sunny Day

Supersonic.desc: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.
Supersonic.name: Supersonic

Swagger.desc: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.
Swagger.name: Swagger

Swallow.desc: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.
Swallow.name: Swallow

Sweet Kiss.desc: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.
Sweet Kiss.name: Sweet Kiss

Sweet Scent.desc: A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon's evasiveness.
Sweet Scent.name: Sweet Scent

Switcheroo.desc: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.
Switcheroo.name: Switcheroo

Swords Dance.desc: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack stat.
Swords Dance.name: Swords Dance

Synthesis.desc: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
Synthesis.name: Synthesis

Tail Glow.desc: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.
Tail Glow.name: Tail Glow

Tail Whip.desc: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stats.
Tail Whip.name: Tail Whip

Tailwind.desc: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stats of the user and its allies for four turns.
Tailwind.name: Tailwind

Tar Shot.desc: The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the target's Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to Fire-type moves.
Tar Shot.name: Tar Shot

Taunt.desc: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.
Taunt.name: Taunt

Tearful Look.desc: The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
Tearful Look.name: Tearful Look

Teatime.desc: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.
Teatime.name: Teatime

Teeter Dance.desc: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses the Pokémon around it.
Teeter Dance.name: Teeter Dance

Telekinesis.desc: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.
Telekinesis.name: Telekinesis

Teleport.desc: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if any. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.
Teleport.name: Teleport

Thunder Wave.desc: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.
Thunder Wave.name: Thunder Wave

Tickle.desc: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.
Tickle.name: Tickle

Topsy-Turvy.desc: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.
Topsy-Turvy.name: Topsy-Turvy

Torment.desc: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.
Torment.name: Torment

Toxic.desc: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
Toxic.name: Toxic

Toxic Spikes.desc: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.
Toxic Spikes.name: Toxic Spikes

Toxic Thread.desc: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target's Speed stat.
Toxic Thread.name: Toxic Thread

Transform.desc: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.
Transform.name: Transform

Trick.desc: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.
Trick.name: Trick

Trick Room.desc: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.
Trick Room.name: Trick Room

TrickorTreat.desc: The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target's type.
TrickorTreat.name: Trick-or-Treat

VenomDrench.desc: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.
VenomDrench.name: Venom Drench

WaterSport.desc: This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can't be remembered.
WaterSport.name: Water Sport

Whirlwind.desc: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind

WideGuard.desc: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.
WideGuard.name: Wide Guard

WillOWisp.desc: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.
WillOWisp.name: Will-O-Wisp

Wish.desc: One turn after this move is used, the user's or its replacement's HP is restored by half the user's max HP.
Wish.name: Wish

Withdraw.desc: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.
Withdraw.name: Withdraw

WonderRoom.desc: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.
WonderRoom.name: Wonder Room

WorkUp.desc: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.
WorkUp.name: Work Up

WorrySeed.desc: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target's Ability Insomnia.
WorrySeed.name: Worry Seed

Yawn.desc: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.
Yawn.name: Yawn
